articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Kim Jong Nam
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Kim Jong Nam
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent a wreath to the bier of Academician, Prof. and Dr. and People's Scientist Kim Jong Nam, researcher at the Specialized Hygienic and Preventive Hospital of the Korean General Red-Cross Hospital, on Friday, expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: Film Workers Union of Korea Slams Park Geun Hye Group for Anti-DPRK Film Production
articles.content:
Film Workers Union of Korea Slams Park Geun Hye Group for Anti-DPRK Film Production
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Since Park Geun Hye came to power, her group has spent a large amount of money collected from the south Korean people as taxes to massively produce and screen different kinds of films groundlessly hurting the system in the DPRK and inciting confrontation with the compatriots.
					 These days the group unhesitatingly produced and distributed such provocative films as "Skirmish in Waters off Yonphyong" and "Inchon Landing Operation" justifying the reckless armed provocations against the north and aggression by the U.S. and south Korean warmongers and inciting war hysteria and even imprudently hurting the political system in the DPRK and misrepresenting the happy life of its people.
					
					 A few days ago, Park Geun Hye together with her minions attended a "film preview." They staged such charades as "fund-raising campaign" and "awarding of commendations" in a bid to raise social concern for the production of anti-DPRK films and made it compulsory for all the cinema houses to screen the above-said films.
					
					 A spokesman for the Central Committee of the Film Workers Union of Korea in a statement on Friday said this is nothing but a traitorous and anti-reunification campaign to incite bad blood toward the compatriots in the north among south Korean youth and students and other people and drive the frozen north-south relations into an uncontrollable catastrophe.
					
					 The statement noted:
					
					 Lurking behind the Park Geun Hye group's desperate campaign to produce anti-DPRK films going against the demand of the times is a sinister scenario to justify their confrontation policy by stoking hostility and distrust in the compatriots in the north among south Koreans.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group should bear in mind with no gamut of deception and gimmick can they chill the south Korean people's growing desire for reunification and longing for the DPRK.
					
					 The movie persons in south Korea should not join in the despicable production of confrontation-films launched by the Park's group but properly discern its traitorous nature and fulfill their mission and duty before the times and the nation through righteous creative activities conducive to the reconciliation and unity of the nation, though belatedly.
					
					 The anachronistic anti-DPRK film production by the Park group forsaken by the people would only precipitate their miserable end.

articles.title: Poster for Ninth Congress of Youth League Produced
articles.content:
Poster for Ninth Congress of Youth League Produced
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- A poster was produced to show the determination of the young vanguard across the country to glorify the Ninth Congress of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League as a grand festival of young people of Juche Korea.
					 The poster depicts the emblem of the youth league against the background of the sky over Kim Il Sung Square where fireworks are displayed and the letters reading "Ninth Congress of Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League."
					
					 It reflects the unshakable faith and will of five million members of the young vanguard to fully display the spirit of Paektusan hero youth in the general offensive and charge for carrying out the decision of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea by inheriting the history and tradition of the youth league which has taken the lead in upholding the Party's cause in the annals of the arduous revolution and thus fulfill their mission as reliable reserves, advancing group and wing of the Party.

articles.title: Agitation Activities Encourages Construction of Ryomyong Street
articles.content:
Agitation Activities Encourages Construction of Ryomyong Street
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Central art troupes of the DPRK have carried on agitation activities for encouraging builders to speed up the construction of Ryomyong Street.
					 From May this year, they have inspired soldiers and builders to great achievements through frontline-style agitation activities, working together with them. 
					
					 Among those troupes are the Mansudae Art Troupe, the National Folk Art Troupe, the National Circus and the Phibada Opera Troupe.
					
					 Kim Chang Su, a soldier builder of the Korean People's Army, said whenever he hears their animato songs, he feels highly spirited.
					
					 Artistes from the National Theatrical Troupe and film stars are also taking part in agitation activities.
					
					 Jon Sun Sok, a musical director of the Mansudae Art Troupe, told KCNA: 
					
					 The construction of the Ryomyong Street represents the stamina of the DPRK, which is dynamically advancing despite of the persistent anti-DPRK sanctions and pressure put by the U.S. and its followers. I will do my best to complete the street at an early date.

articles.title: Coal Output on Increase in DPRK
articles.content:
Coal Output on Increase in DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Collieries across the DPRK have increased coal output as part of the on-going 200-day campaign of loyalty.
					 Taking the lead in it are over 10 coal-mining complexes. 
					
					 The Tokchon Area Coal-mining Complex turned out over 25,000 more tons of coal than scheduled as of August 16, 77 days after the start of the campaign.
					
					 Pukchang, Sunchon and Tukjang area coal-mining complexes also produced several thousand more tons of coal respectively during the days.
					
					 In particular, the Namyang Coal Mine boosted over 10,000 more tons of coal.
					
					 Several million tons of coal reserves have been secured at collieries throughout the country by keeping tunneling ahead of mining.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Namdok Coal Mine under the Pukchang Area Coal-mining Complex has raised its mucking capacity 1.2 times.
					
					 Such achievements are attributable to the high spirit of coal miners in different parts of the country who are waging a vigorous emulation drive for increased production and mass technological innovation movement.

articles.title: Oun Revolutionary Site Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
articles.content:
Oun Revolutionary Site Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- The Oun Revolutionary Site is visited by an endless stream of people on the occasion of the Day of Songun.
					 Being briefed on the revolutionary site before  the monument to the revolutionary activities of leader Kim Jong Il "Oh, Land of glory shining with footprints of the great brilliant commander", the visitors looked back upon the feats he performed by leading students to firmly arm themselves with the Juche-oriented military idea and war methods during the period of military camping.
					
					 At the Oun Revolutionary Museum, they were deeply moved to watch the oil painting depicting the young general in his twenties commanding a bird's-eye view of mountains and rivers with one of his hands at his waist.
					
					 At living quarters, site for studying and talking, lecture room, firing range, hurdle-overcoming training ground, they were briefed with emotion on the fact that he trained the campers as revolutionary soldiers intensely loyal to the Party.
					
					 Over 10,150,000 service personnel, working people and youth and students from more than 34,160 organizations have visited the revolutionary site since it was inaugurated in July, Juche 68 (1979).

articles.title: Military Attaches Corps Visit Youth Movement Museum
articles.content:
Military Attaches Corps Visit Youth Movement Museum
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here Thursday visited the Youth Movement Museum ahead of the 56th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The guests laid a bouquet before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il standing among youth and children at the main lobby and paid tribute to them.
					
					 They looked round photos and historic mementoes dealing with the exploits performed by the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu for developing the Juche-oriented youth movement and data on the proud history of the young people who have followed the Party with loyalty.
					
					 They toured the Mirim Riding Club and the Mirim Air Club on Friday.

articles.title: Onpho Holiday Camp
articles.content:
Onpho Holiday Camp 
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Holiday camps in scenic spots of the DPRK are crowded nowadays.
					 Among them is the Onpho Holiday Camp in Kyongsong County of North Hamgyong Province, which is well-known over the country for a hot spring.
					
					 Campers enjoy hot-spring bath, mountaineering, picnic, reading, sports games, folklore amusements, angling, etc. at the state expense.
					
					 Ri Jong Nam, a worker of the West Pyongyang Service Brigade of Engine, told KCNA that he felt refreshed at the camp.
					
					 Campers include those from the Sunchon Chemical Complex, Tokchon Area Coal-Mining Complex, Komusan Cement Factory.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Making Leap Forward in Building Socialist Power
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Making Leap Forward in Building Socialist Power
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday in an editorial calls for making steady leap forward in building a socialist power by learning from the fighting traits of the Korean People's Army (KPA) devotedly implementing the Party's policies.
					 The KPA is the army of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), death-defying corps in defending socialism and shock-brigade in building a socialist power, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 Under the guidance of the peerless Songun brilliant commander the service personnel have firmly armed themselves with the revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu, possessed brave attack methods and trained dauntless valor of making leap forward in the spirit of "At one go."
					
					 Adversity has turned into favorable condition and a new history been created to bring dramatic changes thanks to the heroic struggle of the service personnel who do not know the word "impossibility."
					
					 Their spirit of flattening even a mountain and emptying a sea once they are ordered to do so serves as a powerful engine propelling the whole country to share the idea and intention with the Party Central Committee and keep pace with it and as a strong weapon for bringing about eye-opening events and changes.
					
					 Sky-high is the spirit of all service personnel and people who are all out in the building of a socialist power under the leadership of the ever-victorious WPK.
					
					 The servicepersons and people of the DPRK are dynamically advancing along the road of prosperity unfolded by the Party Central Committee while demonstrating their dignity as masters of the invincible politico-ideological power, independent nuclear power no one dare to provoke.
					
					 Their unity in idea and fighting traits, the modeling of the revolutionary ranks on the monolithic idea have been successfully achieved in the grandiose drive for implementing the idea and policies of the Party and upholding its policies.
					
					 No difficulties are insurmountable when the servicepersons' spirit of devotedly implementing the Party's policies is displayed in attaining the exceptionally high goals and weathering manifold ordeals, the editorial concludes.

articles.title: South Korean Warmongers Hell-bent on Arms Build-up
articles.content:
South Korean Warmongers Hell-bent on Arms Build-up
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet warmongers are stepping up the arms build-up for preemptive attack on the DPRK with the U.S. backing.
					 The south Korean puppet military authorities decided to drastically increase Hyonmu-type missiles, one of triad together with Kill Chain and home-made missile defence system, while crying out for "disabling the north's missiles".
					
					 They are also mulling deploying for action locally developed guided bombs installed with U.S.-made military GPS from the next month.
					
					 They are contemplating the additional purchase of air-to-surface missiles outside their plan to mount a precision strike at the northern part of Korea including Pyongyang and core facilities by use of F-15K.
					
					 They plan to install the latest combat system and SM-3 missiles capable of carrying out air operations as well as detecting and intercepting ballistic missiles, on three Aegis destroyers to be built in 2020.

articles.title: S. Korean Opposition Parties Declare "Agreement" on Sexual Slavery for Imperial Japanese Army Null and Void
articles.content:
S. Korean Opposition Parties Declare "Agreement" on Sexual Slavery for Imperial Japanese Army Null and Void
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- South Korean opposition parties are growing vocal calling for the nullification of the "agreement" on the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, according to media including News 1, Segye Ilbo and Kukmin Ilbo of south Korea.
					 A parliamentary spokesman from the Minju Party in a commentary said that the "agreement" unilaterally made by the regime without seeking understanding of victims is not understandable from the viewpoint not only of victims but of the people.
					
					 A spokesman for the Minju Party noted that the only way of solving the issue of sexual slavery is for the Japanese government to make apology and own a legal and moral responsibility for it. He expressed the will to make efforts to probe the truth behind the "agreement" on the issue of sexual slavery in a secret room in a rough-and-ready manner through regular sessions of the "National Assembly" and inspection of administration and let Japan make a sincere apology and reparation for its wrongdoings.
					
					 A parliamentary spokesman for the Kukmin Party in a commentary urged the south Korean and Japanese authorities to clarify the stand on the report that one billion yen paid by the Japanese government was premised on the removal of girl statue.

articles.title: Kimchon Citizens of S. Korea Launch No-THAAD Action
articles.content:
Kimchon Citizens of S. Korea Launch No-THAAD Action
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- The Kimchon City Council of Democratic and Civic Organizations in south Korea involving 11 bodies such as Freight Workers' Solidarity, Railways Trade Union, Health and Medical Workers Trade Union and the Kimchon branch of the Teachers Union is dynamically waging No-THAAD action, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 The council formed the Kimchon No-THAAD Measure Committee on August 16 in protest against the discussion on choosing a site for THAAD deployment near Songju Golf Links closer to Kimchon than Songju Country Township.
					
					 They went to the city "assembly" and demanded it make public a statement in protest against THAAD deployment and decided to hold a candlelight rally against THAAD deployment.
					
					 The city "assembly" in a statement declared the will to wage the struggle to the last in protest against THAAD deployment threatening vital rights of Kimchon citizens.
					
					 In the evening of August 16 the Kimchon No-THAAD Measure Committee and residents blocked roads with farm machines and staged a demo.

articles.title: Anti-War Peace Demo Staged in Japan
articles.content:
Anti-War Peace Demo Staged in Japan
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Civic organizations of south Korea and Japan staged a demonstration in Tokyo on Aug. 13 calling for peace against war, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 Hundreds of demonstrators marched along Tokyo streets.
					
					 Before the demo there was a seminar, at which a professor at Tokyo University expressed concern that the "security legislation" has been in force since March as the legislation is in wanton violation of the constitution, calling upon political and public circles of Japan to strive to preserve Article 9 of the constitution.

articles.title: Korea's Liberation Day Marked in Hungary, Slovenia
articles.content:
Korea's Liberation Day Marked in Hungary, Slovenia 
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Lectures and film shows took place in Hungary and Slovenia on August 13 on the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The chairman of the Workers' Party of Hungary said Korea, which was under the military occupation by the Japanese imperialists for over four decades, was liberated under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and since then the new history of Korea started.
					
					 In the near future, the DPRK will demonstrate its might as a socialist power, he added.
					
					 The chairman of the Slovenia-Korea Friendship Association and other personages praised Kim Il Sung for defeating the Japanese imperialists and achieving the historic cause of Korea's liberation.
					
					 Korean films showing appearance of Pyongyang were shown.

articles.title: Day of Songun, Korea's Liberation Day Marked in Switzerland
articles.content:
Day of Songun, Korea's Liberation Day Marked in Switzerland
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- A meeting, photo and book exhibition and film show took place in Switzerland on August 13 on the 56th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership (Day of Songun) and the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 On display in the venue were photos of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un. Also displayed were their works and other books and photos introducing the struggle of service personnel and people of the DPRK.
					
					 Korean film "My Country Has Emerged Victorious by Dint of Single-minded Unity" was shown.
					
					 Present there were personages of the Swiss preparatory committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and other people.
					
					 Martin Lotscher, chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee, said the great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il left the first trace of the Songun revolutionary leadership by giving the historic field guidance to the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on August 25, 1960.
					
					 Generalissimo Kim Il Sung liberated Korea from the brutal and colonial rule by the Japanese imperialists on August 15, 1945, paving the way for resurrection of the nation, he said, and went on:
					
					 The Korean people grandly celebrate August 25 as Day of Songun and August 15 as day of national liberation.
					
					 We extend warm congratulations to the Korean people on the holidays.

articles.title: Iranian Paper Marks Korea's Liberation Day
articles.content:
Iranian Paper Marks Korea's Liberation Day
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- The Iranian paper Iran News on August 14 carried an article on the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The article said:
					
					 August 15 this year marks the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation from the military occupation by the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung led the long anti-Japanese armed struggle to victory and achieved the historic cause of Korea's liberation.
					
					 The Japanese imperialists made desperate efforts to exterminate the Korean nation during their colonial rule over Korea.
					
					 After the liberation the Korean people could enjoy an independent and dignified life as proud master of the state and society.
					
					 Then a peculiar socialist system centered on the popular masses and invincible socialist state undeterred by any storm could be built in Korea.
					
					 The reality in the DPRK, which is making a fresh leap and innovation in building a socialist power, makes people deeply recall the historic meaning of Korea's liberation that brought to its people a turning point in carving out their destiny and achieving prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Thai Personage Supports DPRK
articles.content:
Thai Personage Supports DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- The DPRK will emerge ever-victorious, upholding the banner of the Juche idea, the Songun idea.
					 Songchit Pullarp, chairman of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand, said this in a statement on August 15.
					
					 Noting that August 15 marks the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation from the colonial rule by the Japanese imperialists, he went on:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the Korean people, was born at a time when Korea was under the colonial rule by the Japanese imperialists and embarked upon the road of revolution in his early years and fathered the Juche idea.
					
					 The President achieved Korea's liberation under the banner of Juche and led the Korean revolution to victory.
					
					 The Korean people could win the Fatherland Liberation War against the U.S. imperialists' invasion and build a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence as they struggled with the Juche idea as guidelines.
					
					 The Korean people have achieved eye-opening successes as they advanced the revolution and construction with the Juche idea as guiding idea.
					
					 If the DPRK had depended on others, it would neither have protected socialism nor become satellite manufacturer and launcher and nuclear weapons state.

articles.title: Swiss Bodies Denounce Park Geun Hye Group for Moving for THAAD Deployment in S. Korea
articles.content:
Swiss Bodies Denounce Park Geun Hye Group for Moving for THAAD Deployment in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on August 13 made public a joint statement in denunciation of the Park Geun Hye group for persistently finding fault with the DPRK to evade the blame for the decision on THAAD deployment in south Korea.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Park Geun Hye describes THAAD deployment as one to cope with the "threat" from the DPRK.
					
					 She dares try to compare THAAD with the nuclear deterrence of the DPRK.
					
					 The nuclear deterrence of the DPRK can never be a bargaining one.
					
					 Threat of a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula comes from the U.S.
					
					 South Korea will reduce to the advanced base of the U.S. for aggression as long as Park Geun Hye, top-class pro-U.S. lackey, remains in power.
					
					 It is necessary to decisively throw overboard the Park Geun Hye group to achieve peace on the Korean peninsula as it is a disgrace to the Korean nation and trouble-maker of the international community.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante el feretro de difunto Kim Jong Nam
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante el feretro de difunto Kim Jong Nam
Pyongyang, 19 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Jong Un, envio el dia 19 una ofrenda floral ante el feretro del difunto Kim Jong Nam, Cientifico del Pueblo, Academico, Profesor y Doctor quien es el investigador del Centro Preventivo Especializado de Higiene del Hospital Universal de la Cruz Roja de Corea, en senal de profundas condolencias por su fallecimiento

articles.title: Cineastas coreanos condenan la fabricacion de peliculas anti-RPDC en Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Cineastas coreanos condenan la fabricacion de peliculas anti-RPDC en Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 19 de agosto (ACNC) -- Desde cuando tomo el mandato del Sur de Corea la camarilla de Park Geun-hye vino produciendo y proyectando muchas peliculas que difaman injustamente el regimen de la RPDC y fomentan la confrontacion fratricida, malgastando fabulosos impuestos de la poblacion surcoreana.
					Ultimamente, fabrico sin titubeo los filmes como "Batalla maritima de Yonphyong" y "Operacion de desembarco de Inchon", justificando las imprudentes provocaciones armadas de agresion al Norte y los actos agresivos de Estados Unidos y los titeres surcoreanos, inculcando el ambiente belico y tergiversando atrevida y absurdamente el sistema politico y la vida dichosa del pueblo de la RPDC.
					
					Hace poco, la traidora Park participo en el llamado "preestreno de pelicula" junto con sus lacayos y orquesto unas payasadas como la "campana de recaudacion de dinero" y la "ceremonia de premiacion" a fin de elevar la atencion social a la fabricacion de filmes anti-RPDC. Y obligo a proyectarlos en todos los cines.
					
					En su declaracion fechada 19, el vocero del Comite Central de la Union de Cineastas de Corea lo califica de una imprudencia antinacional y anti-reunificacion para fomentar entre los jovenes y estudiantes y los habitantes surcoreanos la enemistad a su connacional y llevar a la fase catastrofica las relaciones intercoreanas en el peor estado conflictivo, y prosigue:
					
					Las tentativas de la horda traidora de Park de fabricar los filmes anti-RPDC navegando a contrapelo de la demanda de la epoca, persiguen la malsana intencion de justificar su politica conflictiva al fomentar entre la poblacion surcoreana la hostilidad y la desconfianza a su connacional.
					
					Park debe saber correctamente que con cualesquier ardides no podra impedir jamas la aspiracion de los habitantes surcoreanos a la reunificacion y su deseo vehemente por la RPDC. 
					
					Los cineastas surcoreanos deben distinguir correctamente la naturaleza traidora de los compinches traidores en vez de adherirse a la campana de Park de producir los filmes de caracter conflictivo. Y deben desarrollar las actividades creativas favorables para la reconciliacion y la unidad de la nacion, cumpliendo asi con su mision y deber asumidos ante la epoca y la nacion.
					
					Esta farsa anacronica de la traidora Park adelantara solo el momento de su fin tragico.
